title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4005.1 - Commission approval required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4005.1 - Commission approval required

State Regulations

None of the following officials employed by any
association is permitted to perform duties unless approved in writing by the
commission: all stewards, racing secretaries, handicappers, starters, placing
judges, clerks of the scales, paddock and patrol judges, timers, examining
veterinarians and track veterinarians, veterinary technicians and such other
persons as the commission may designate from time to time because of their
importance in the actual conduct of racing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4005.1

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/10/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
